item.title: A digital prescription for the pharma industry
item.dc:creator: itadmin
item.description: Can procure him some great pleasure to take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences.
item.content:encoded: Can procure him some great pleasure to take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences.
